price: Oya! Mu by’ukuri kuri uwo munsi bazabuzwa kureba Nyagasani wabo.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
